The best Rock band in years. American Minor is a 5 piece band from Huntington WV and have released their self titled debut album on Jive records on Aug 19. 
 www.americanminormusic.com and www.myspace.com/americanminor
 
 I've saw them 3 times and they get better every time. I saw them Friday when my brother's band Jake Leg (www.myspace.com/jakeleg) opened up for their record release party followed by The Hiss (www.myspace.com/thehiss).
 
 American Minor ended with a dead on cover of the Allman Brothers' "Whipping Post" 
 
 Thought I'd spread the word to any rock fans.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  American Minor!
